item.title: ‘We don’t want to get into trouble’: Can we give our daughter a $30K wedding gift without involving the IRS?
item.description: “What is the best way to go about this?”

item.title: Our two daughters are struggling with student debt. Should we dip into our $1.8 million 401(k)s to buy them apartments?
item.description: “Each apartment would be priced close to $225,000.”

item.title: I received an inheritance from my father’s estate, but the executor wants me to give it back. What should I do?

item.title: ‘A friend calls it the everything bubble’: Why do so many economists fear a 1929-style crash?
item.description: We have faced fears, for more than 10 years, that the market is going to experience the kind of crash not seen in nearly a century.

item.title: The government shutdown is forcing investors to trade on faith. What they need are facts.
item.description: Investors are wary of stocks and earnings viewed through political fog.
